channel.title: Please, take your time and read
channel.description:
This is a [b]Serious[/b] question that I have, and am very much hoping that I can get it resolved atleast by tonight or tomarrow.
I have some clients for a 508 server, and I also have the 508 caches, and about 3 different 508 servers, all of them are working fully functionally on a computer I tested them on. However, when I try them on [b]My[/b] actually computer, I also recieve the error: [b]'error_game_js5connect'[/b]. I [b]Do Not[/b] have No-IP, and I do not have Internet on my computer. What I use to connect is: [b]'127.0.0.1'[/b].
I wanted to know If I have to Portforward to resolve the problem, even though my computer doesn't have internet. The clients only recieve these errors when i'm using them on my one computer.
Please help, I would very [b]VERY[/b] much appreciate it. And if you are able to help, PM, and i'll give you an [B]AWSOME!!![/B] 508 Source-Base for your server in-return; if that's allowed, if not then Nvm..
~Thanks~

item.title: Please, take your time and read
item.dc:creator: @system system

item.title: Please, take your time and read
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

This is a Serious question that I have, and am very much hoping that I can get it resolved atleast by tonight or tomarrow.

I have some clients for a 508 server, and I also have the 508 caches, and about 3 different 508 servers, all of them are working fully functionally on a computer I tested them on. However, when I try them on My actually computer, I also recieve the error: ‘error_game_js5connect’. I Do Not have No-IP, and I do not have Internet on my computer. What I use to connect is: ‘127.0.0.1’.

I wanted to know If I have to Portforward to resolve the problem, even though my computer doesn’t have internet. The clients only recieve these errors when i’m using them on my one computer.

Please help, I would very VERY much appreciate it. And if you are able to help, PM, and i’ll give you an AWSOME!!! 508 Source-Base for your server in-return; if that’s allowed, if not then Nvm…

~Thanks~

Read full topic
